column5: Lovely, and tastefully furnished luxury condo located on the Island on Lake Travis - a luxurious, serene, and breathtaking island villa. Get ready to be refreshed. Enjoy access to golf course, marina, biking/hiking trails, pool, sauna, etc. It is great for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).We also have a 10' x 24' boat slip rentable for $35/night.
